Another entry is a listing of the attempts to destroy the sphere and 
release those beings, but to no avail.  One of the last entries is about

The very last entry says that Suzerin was going to get rid of some creature

ghenna9935@ghenna.title: Eaten to death.
ghenna9935@ghenna.description:
Boy, the smell of sulfur just keeps getting stronger - YUCK!  As if 
that werent bad enough, there are about a hundred horribly disfigured 
corpses laying here.  It looks as though the flesh was eaten off of 
their living bodies as they writhed in agony.  The stream of blood you 
witnessed at the entrance is much larger here, apparently you are onto 
something.

ghenna9978@ghenna.title: A covered walkway.
ghenna9978@ghenna.description:
This is a covered walkway which leads Downward, into darkness.  The 
air is so humid here that you can see it.  North of you the way is 
open as well.

ghenna9926@ghenna.title: A labyrinth of bodies.
ghenna9926@ghenna.description:
You are standing within a labyrinth created from bodies which are 
stacked 10 feet high.  It seems that some of the bodies are still warm,
and an occasional moan or cry of despair comes from the mass.

ghenna9973@ghenna.title: The top of the stairs.
ghenna9973@ghenna.description:
Apparently the hookers who work here are pretty slovenly.  There 
are all manner of clothing on the floor - most of it soiled quite 
badly.  A hallway leads towards the West, lit by a single red 
lightbulb.

ghenna9900@ghenna.title: A barrow mound.
ghenna9900@ghenna.description:
You are standing atop a barrow &+ymound&* which is about 15 feet in 
diameter.  There is no vegetation inside the circle, strangely 
enough.  A low cumulous of swirling mist engulfs you from the 
knees down, making it look as though you are partially buried.

ghenna9986@ghenna.title: A long sloping tunnel.
ghenna9986@ghenna.description:
You are in a long tunnel which slopes ever so slightly toward the 
South.  The smooth rock walls look like they are sweating - there is 
SO much moisture.

ghenna9928@ghenna.title: A labyrinth of bodies.
ghenna9928@ghenna.description:
You are standing within a labyrinth created from bodies which are 
stacked 10 feet high.  It seems that some of the bodies are still warm,
and an occasional muffled scream comes from the mass.

ghenna9965@ghenna.title: A vandalized closet.
ghenna9965@ghenna.description:
You are standing in a small, walk-in closet.  Children's clothes, 
and shoe boxes lie about, stinking of mildew.  There appears to be 
only one exit - East.

ghenna9904@ghenna.title: A culdesac
ghenna9904@ghenna.description:
You are standing on a cobblestone circle of a small culdesac.  
To the East is a large fountain, and a door lies to the North, 
beneath a large tavern sign depicting the unspeakable.

ghenna9963@ghenna.title: Upstairs in a trashed home.
ghenna9963@ghenna.description:
Things don't look much better up here.  The ceiling has caved in on 
both sides, blocking the exits east and west.  Some foul smelling 
mildew has grown over most of the debris.  A door hangs by one hinge 
toward the North.

ghenna9906@ghenna.title: The twisting hedges.
ghenna9906@ghenna.description:
You are standing amongst a row of twisting hedges about 7 feet 
tall.  Pathways through the hedges lead in all cardinal directions.

ghenna9981@ghenna.title: A slimey footpath.
ghenna9981@ghenna.description:
Slime, slime, everywhere.  A wounded Dwarf is laying here, half 
immersed in the red slime.  Maybe this wasn't such a good idea...
You can exit towards the West, or to the South.

ghenna9952@ghenna.title: The seat of power.
ghenna9952@ghenna.description:
Fire, fire, everywhere.  A black, marble dais sits amidst the 
flames supporting a black, marble chair which is conspicuously 
empty.  This looks to be a throne of some sort.  The flames make 
every way impassable except the way you came, and the way of the holy.

ghenna9948@ghenna.title: Free fall.
ghenna9948@ghenna.description:
You start
         \S 
          \L 
           \I 
            \D 
             \I 
              \N 
               \G 
                \  
                 \D 
                  \O 
                   \W 
                    \N 
                     \W

                       \R 
                        \D 	 And land in a heap, right next
				 to a small hole in the floor
				 Smells like somethings cooking.

ghenna9997@ghenna.title: The lair of the Deepspawn.
ghenna9997@ghenna.description:
You have entered a 20 foot square opening that appears to be a lair 
of some sort.  Bones lie strewn about in every corner - most of them 
appear to be human bones.  A big pile of treasure sits in the center 
of the room covered with the red mucus that lines the walls here.  
Exits lead in all cardinal directions.

ghenna100@ghenna.title: Small Opening
ghenna100@ghenna.description:
Behind that boulder appears to be a small area just big enough for
you to move around freely.  Seems someone went to great lengths to keep
something hid in here.

ghenna9969@ghenna.title: A bend in the road.
ghenna9969@ghenna.description:
You are at a bend in the road.  The city wall lies north, and east 
of you prohibiting exits in those directions.  A narrow lane leads 
Westward.

ghenna9908@ghenna.title: The twisting hedges.
ghenna9908@ghenna.description:
You are standing amongst a row of twisting hedges about 7 feet 
tall.  Pathways through the hedges lead in all cardinal directions.

ghenna9909@ghenna.title: The twisting hedges.
ghenna9909@ghenna.description:
You are standing amongst a row of twisting hedges about 7 feet 
tall.  Pathways through the hedges lead in all cardinal directions.

ghenna9974@ghenna.title: An upstairs hallway.
ghenna9974@ghenna.description:
The hallway continues towards the East and West, while to the North 
a door stands ajar, a "Do Not Disturb" sign hanging from the knob.

ghenna9971@ghenna.title: The waiting room.
ghenna9971@ghenna.description:
This is a quaint little waiting room where the customers to this 
brothel can relax and kick back at will.  A lovely floral couch is 
sitting here before a solid glass coffee table littered with lingerie 
magazines.  To the West is a staircase.

ghenna9966@ghenna.title: A city street in Ghenna.
ghenna9966@ghenna.description:
You are standing on a street in Ghenna.  The city wall lies east, 
blocking your exit.  You may leave North, South and West.  Be careful 
not to trip over the many corpses that line these streets.

ghenna9992@ghenna.title: A wide tunnel.
ghenna9992@ghenna.description:
This tunnel is a little broader, and easier to maneuver in.  
However, you have become confused... which way is which?  There 
is a hole in the wall to the North, and another path leads South.

ghenna9923@ghenna.title: The bathroom.
ghenna9923@ghenna.description:
Boy, the smell of feces here is awful!!  There is a hole in the 
floor which serves as the toilet - pretty primitive.  A washbasin 
sits on the floor, filled with bloodied water, and a dirty &+Cmirror 
reflects your image.

ghenna9979@ghenna.title: A slimey footpath.
ghenna9979@ghenna.description:
What the heck?!  This footpath is covered with a slimey substance 
akin to ectoplasm - its really gross.  The path is so slippery that 
you cant ascend to where there is a covered walkway above you.  Your 
only option is to go West.

ghenna9934@ghenna.title: Inside the cave entrance.
ghenna9934@ghenna.description:
You are standing inside the cave entrance, where a strong smell of 
sulfur makes you gag.  Large stone steps lead back downward to where 
a labyrinth of bodies can be seen.  A steady stream of blood seems 
to be trickling from somewhere up north, where a sound similar to a 
giant bellows can be heard.

ghenna9922@ghenna.title: The master suite.
ghenna9922@ghenna.description:
This is the master suite inside Blood Tavern.  A liquor cabinet 
stands against one wall, filled with dusty old bottles, while a 
king sized bed stands opposite.  A half opened door to the West 
leads into a bathroom.

ghenna9915@ghenna.title: Blood Tavern.
ghenna9915@ghenna.description:
You are standing inside Blood Tavern - a bizarre looking place, at 
first sight.  The parquet floor creaks under the weight of an odd 
looking bar to the north which seems to be moving somehow.  Next to 
the bar a stairwell disappears into blackness above.  The ceiling is 
vaulted, and sports three candeled chandeliers, which hang like 
victims above you.

ghenna9999@ghenna.title: A pit of jutting spears.
ghenna9999@ghenna.description:
You 
    F
      A
        L
          L
	
	      and die, impaled by a dozen spears.

&+W  | |  | |  | |  | |  | |  | |  | |  | |  | |  | |  | |  | |  | |  | | 
&+W  | |  | |  | |  | |  | |  | |  | |  | |  | |  | |  | |  | |  | |  | | 

&+RFATALITY!!!

ghenna9947@ghenna.title: A backwall niche.
ghenna9947@ghenna.description:
This backwall niche is dank, dark and dusty.  The brick walls show 
the telltale signs of decay - red and black flakes, which lay on the 
floor.  An old &+Mcask&* of port wine lies broken in one corner, a relic 
from happier times.  The only apparent exit is back to the West.

ghenna9918@ghenna.title: The top of the stairs.
ghenna9918@ghenna.description:
You are standing at the top of the stairs in Blood Tavern.  Darkness 
prevails in the small hallway which runs east to west.  Below you is 
the bar of human skin.

ghenna9942@ghenna.title: Certain Death.
ghenna9942@ghenna.description:
You have made a foolish mistake, my friend.  This is the Genie's 
equivalent of the forbidden fruit.  A giant hand emerges through a 
rift in time and squashes you flat, like a bug.
 
		    ------------------
		     
			  &+RSPLAT!!
			      .
				  .
				      .  &+RYOU ARE DEAD!!

ghenna9932@ghenna.title: A labyrinth of bodies.
ghenna9932@ghenna.description:
You are standing within a labyrinth created from bodies which are 
stacked 10 feet high.  It seems that some of the bodies are still warm,
and an occasional cry of despair comes from the mass.

ghenna9970@ghenna.title: The best little whorehouse in Ghenna.
ghenna9970@ghenna.description:
This room is lit by the glow of several red lights.  Lingerie, and 
various pleasure toys litter the floor, which is carpeted in a lovely 
mauve shag.  To the south is a waiting room where you can see a couch 
sitting behind a glass coffee table.

ghenna9951@ghenna.title: The streets of Ghenna.
ghenna9951@ghenna.description:
You are standing on a city street in Ghenna.  Paved with cobble-
stones, the road is slick with the blood of many a wayward adventurer.
Watch your step!

ghenna9958@ghenna.title: The dominatrix's abode.
ghenna9958@ghenna.description:
This room is filled with all manner of black, silver studded leather.
Whips, chains and handcuffs are displayed prominently on each of the 
3 walls.  A position chair sits in the middle of the room for your 
hedonistic desires.

ghenna9910@ghenna.title: The realm of the hopeless.
ghenna9910@ghenna.description:
The incessant wailing of souls in torment causes visible shivers 
up and down your spine.  The walls, floor and ceiling are a viscous, 
blood-red mass that eludes description.  A rift in the ceiling above 
you causes a slight breeze to ruffle your hair.  A magic portal stands 
south, leading into the unknown.

ghenna9920@ghenna.title: A messy bedroom.
ghenna9920@ghenna.description:
You are stainding inside a messy bedroom furnished with a VERY 
stained bed and a simple roll top desk.  A window stands to the north 
overlooking darkness beyond.

ghenna9984@ghenna.title: The mouth of a small cave.
ghenna9984@ghenna.description:
You have arrived at the mouth of a small cave, which is cut into a 
tall promontory.  A rough hewn staircase leads Downwards, while to 
the North is a small clearing.

ghenna9982@ghenna.title: A slimey footpath.
ghenna9982@ghenna.description:
The slime seems to be lessening a bit here, though the way is still 
as slippery as can be.  A clearing can be seen to the South.

ghenna1@ghenna.title: Before the Barrow Mound
ghenna1@ghenna.description:
You stand before a wide barrow &+ymound&*, nearly obsecured by mist.
It is awfully quiet, yet you smell something nearby that reeks of
rotting flesh.  You can climb the mound to the north, or move away
from it to the south.

ghenna9919@ghenna.title: An upstairs hallway.
ghenna9919@ghenna.description:
You are in a small upstairs hallway.  To the West is the top of 
the stairs while to the North there lies a door, behind which you 
can hear some faint singing... the dusky voice sounds almost feminine.

ghenna9944@ghenna.title: The bottom of the granite staircase.
ghenna9944@ghenna.description:
You have reached the bottom of the granite staircase.  This appears 
to be the basement of Blood Tavern.  A hole in the ceiling which is 
stained with excrement hovers above an enormous mountain of feces 
(how nice).  Walls stand to the west, north and south - but the way 
is passable towards the East, around the dungheap.

ghenna9933@ghenna.title: The mouth of a large cave.
ghenna9933@ghenna.description:
Out of the labyrinth at last!  But whats this?  You are standing at 
the mouth of a large cave about 100 feet in diameter.  A steady 
trickle of blood runs down the stone steps which lead upwards - Dare 
you enter?

ghenna9962@ghenna.title: A trashed abode.
ghenna9962@ghenna.description:
This place looks as though it was once a lovely home.  The furniture 
which is completely trashed is reminiscent of a victorian styled era.  
A rickety stairwell leads upward, but doesn't look too stable.  Better 
watch your step.

ghenna9955@ghenna.title: The streets of Ghenna.
ghenna9955@ghenna.description:
You are standing on a North-South running street.  The cobblestone 
pavement batters your feet unmercifully.  To the west is the city 
wall, while a burnedout building is East of you, barely capable of 
standing in the slight breeze which whips through here.

ghenna9917@ghenna.title: The card table.
ghenna9917@ghenna.description:
A card table constructed from the skeleton of an odd quadroped 
sits here, with a few unplayed &+Chands&* left sitting upon it... Wonder 
where the rest of the poor souls' bodies are.  The tavern door lies 
east of here, while to the north is a bar made of what appears to be 
human skin.

ghenna9911@ghenna.title: An undulating room.
ghenna9911@ghenna.description:
This room undulates with an aura of incredible evil.  The shifting 
floor causes you to stagger uncontrollably, while the ceiling 
rhythmically pumps upwards and downwards.  You can feel the lifeblood 
draining from your body.  To stay here long would surely mean the end 
of you.  You feel a strong draft coming from the north.

ghenna9994@ghenna.title: Crawlspace.
ghenna9994@ghenna.description:
The crawlspace opens up into a 10 foot square room filled with all 
manner of insects, most of them HUGE.  Hope you aren't arachnophobic, 
cause if you are, this place would surely scare you to death.  Exits 
lead in all cardinal directions.

ghenna9964@ghenna.title: A child's room.
ghenna9964@ghenna.description:
This was evidently a child's room.  Toys (most of them broken) lie 
scattered around the place.  A mattress leans against the far wall, 
completely slashed down the middle, its stuffing in a heap on the 
floor.  One of the dolls here seems strangely lifelike... Bizarre!

ghenna9916@ghenna.title: At the undead bar.
ghenna9916@ghenna.description:
A long bar stands here constructed of God only knows what.  It 
appears to be made of human flesh sewn together with the hair of 
various beasts.  Although sturdy, the bar is very pliant to the 
touch, and it seems to be MOVING ever so slightly, as if it were 
ALIVE!
  A stairwell is here, leading upwards into blackness.

ghenna9929@ghenna.title: A labyrinth of bodies.
ghenna9929@ghenna.description:
You are standing within a labyrinth created from bodies which are 
stacked 10 feet high.  It seems that some of the bodies are still warm,
and an occasional plea for aid comes from the mass.

ghenna9996@ghenna.title: A quivering jaunt.
ghenna9996@ghenna.description:
This room moves so much that you have a hard time keeping your feet.
The red mucus is hanging from the walls and ceiling in tenebrous 
strings that look quite sickening.  A dark spot on the West wall 
hints at the only possible exit.

ghenna9950@ghenna.title: A makeshift bedroom.
ghenna9950@ghenna.description:
A cot lies against the far wall of this little alcove, directly 
beneath an inverted pentagram scribed in blood.  A bound &+yfootlocker 
stands opposite.  The only exit is back towards the West.

ghenna9977@ghenna.title: The madame's room.
ghenna9977@ghenna.description:
This is the madame's room.  A large bed stands against the opposite 
wall, under a ceiling made entirely of mirrors.  The two lamps that 
are located on either side of the bed are draped with a gauzy red 
material which casts an eerie glow on an array of dildos which are 
mounted on the wall like trophys.

ghenna9902@ghenna.title: A fountain of tears.
ghenna9902@ghenna.description:
A large &+Cfountain&* containing the tears of those slain within the 
city limits has been erected here, abutting the east wall of the 
city - it looks quite deep and wide.  The water is a crystaline blue 
which exudes holiness, something quite strange for such an evil city.
  Exits lead West, North and South.

ghenna9907@ghenna.title: The twisting hedges.
ghenna9907@ghenna.description:
You are standing amongst a row of twisting hedges about 7 feet 
tall.  Pathways through the hedges lead in all cardinal directions.

ghenna9989@ghenna.title: Tunnel's end.
ghenna9989@ghenna.description:
The tunnel opens up into a T shape here, affording exits East and 
West and of course, North, back the way you came.  The cavern is 
vaulted, looming about 25 feet over your head... looks pretty dark up 
there.

ghenna9905@ghenna.title: The twisting hedges.
ghenna9905@ghenna.description:
You are standing amongst a row of twisting hedges about 7 feet 
tall.  Pathways through the hedges lead in all cardinal directions.
Uh no, looks like you lost your way...you can't tell where you were.

ghenna9939@ghenna.title: The adit.
ghenna9939@ghenna.description:
The grotto opens up into an adit big enough for you to stand 
upright.  Stalagmites and stalactites alike jut from the floor and 
ceiling.  There are exits East, North and West.  A bit of a breeze
is coming from the west.

ghenna9941@ghenna.title: Abode of the Efreeti.
ghenna9941@ghenna.description:
You have entered the magical abode of the great Efreeti.  Done in 
an eastern motif, this room glimmers with all the amenities one could 
want.  Pillows, rugs and candelabra are everywhere.  This definitely 
looks like the lap of luxury.  To the North lies the forbidden treasure
room, to enter it is to ask for certain death.

ghenna9961@ghenna.title: The trading post.
ghenna9961@ghenna.description:
You are standing in what was once the trading post.  A dais stands 
in the nothernmost end of the room with a toppled podium upon it.  
Wooden benches lie tipped over in virtually every reach of this 
auditorium sized room.  The city streets of Ghenna lie South of here.

ghenna9975@ghenna.title: A scummy bedroom.
ghenna9975@ghenna.description:
Well, if you had amorous intentions I am sure they have all dis-
appeared at the sight of this room.  A bed is here with a big wet 
spot marring the middle.  Grease stains are smeared on the wall near 
the head of the bed, apparently from someone leaning against it.  The 
floor is sticky - you can guess why.

ghenna9943@ghenna.title: A musty area behind the wall.
ghenna9943@ghenna.description:
You are in a musty, hidden area behind the wall of the bathroom.  
A very narrow granite staircase leads downward, into darkness.

ghenna9987@ghenna.title: A long sloping tunnel.
ghenna9987@ghenna.description:
You are in a long tunnel which slopes ever so slightly toward the 
South.  The smooth rock walls look like they are sweating - there is 
SO much moisture.

ghenna9901@ghenna.title: City limits of Ghenna.
ghenna9901@ghenna.description:
You are standing inside the city limits of Ghenna.  Once a booming 
barter town, it is now a haven for the evil which it bred over long 
years under the rule of the hubristic Lord Suzerain.  In virtually 
every corner you see ruins of some sort or another intermingled with 
old, age-whitened bones from all manner of beasts. 
  Exits lead in all cardinal directions.

ghenna9946@ghenna.title: On the stairs
ghenna9946@ghenna.description:
You are standing on a narrow granite staircase which spirals gently 
downward.  You may ascend, or descend at will.

ghenna9949@ghenna.title: Surrounded by flames.
ghenna9949@ghenna.description:
Wow!  Looks like you just stepped into hell... or at least, a little 
corner of it.  Flames dance on the walls, causing the light to play 
tricks on your eyes.  You can just barely make out a dark figure to 
the north.  Looks to be some sort of stairwell back up to the west,
and a bedroom to the east.

ghenna9959@ghenna.title: A street in Ghenna.
ghenna9959@ghenna.description:
This narrow, dimly lit street leads East into darkness, and West 
towards the city entrance.  The rubble from fallen buildings has 
made any other exits impossible.

ghenna9988@ghenna.title: A long sloping tunnel.
ghenna9988@ghenna.description:
You are in a long tunnel which slopes ever so slightly toward the 
South.  The smooth rock walls look like they are sweating - there is 
SO much moisture.

ghenna9983@ghenna.title: A small clearing.
ghenna9983@ghenna.description:
There is virtually none of that ectoplasmic crap here.  This 
clearing consists of red clay dirt, with a few boulders lying around 
you.  Apparently it is a primitive pathway of some sort, for to the 
South you can see what appears to be the mouth of a cave.

ghenna9957@ghenna.title: The streets of Ghenna.
ghenna9957@ghenna.description:
You are standing on a corner street in Ghenna.  To the west lies 
the city wall while to the North is a door.  The street continues 
South, and East.

ghenna9990@ghenna.title: An east-west tunnel.
ghenna9990@ghenna.description:
This tunnel is only about 5 feet high, much to your chagrin.  Moss-
like lichens hang from the ceiling, brushing past your face from time 
to time.  The tunnel continues East and West.

ghenna9903@ghenna.title: The smell of death.
ghenna9903@ghenna.description:
You are standing in what appears to be the town graveyard.  
Nobody feels the need to bury the dead, so the corpses are just 
strewn about in no particular order.  And the smell, oh boy!  
It's all you can do to keep from losing your lunch right now.  
  The corpses are stacked too high to exit East, but you can 
pass North, South or West.

ghenna9985@ghenna.title: An underground cavern.
ghenna9985@ghenna.description:
This small underground cavern is the most humid place you have ever
been in.  Moisture trickles down the smooth rock walls in large 
rivulets, and water drips on your head from the ceiling above.  A 
passageway leads South.

ghenna9967@ghenna.title: A road in Ghenna.
ghenna9967@ghenna.description:
This road is quite narrow, but seems to open up towards the South.  
A fallen building stands to the West, and the city wall blocks the 
exit north.

ghenna9914@ghenna.title: The streets of Ghenna.
ghenna9914@ghenna.description:
You are standing on a non-descript city street in Ghenna.  The road 
continues East and West, rolling gently over a dale.

ghenna9931@ghenna.title: A labyrinth of bodies.
ghenna9931@ghenna.description:
You are standing within a labyrinth created from bodies which are 
stacked 10 feet high.  It seems that some of the bodies are still warm,
and an occasional shriek of horror comes from the mass.

ghenna9960@ghenna.title: A city street in Ghenna.
ghenna9960@ghenna.description:
There is so much junk in the street here, that you have to walk in 
a zigzag around it.  The outline of a doorframe is all that remains 
of the building to the South.  The building to the North, however, 
looks a bit more intact.  The street ends towards the East, near a 
mountain of rubble.  To the West, the street goes on for some distance.

ghenna9924@ghenna.title: A wrinkle in the fabric of time.
ghenna9924@ghenna.description:
You are caught in a swirling vortex of time, which is very 
nauseating.  You spin and spin, unsure of which way is which.  It 
seems as though you could end up in any of several different places 
by choosing an exit.

ghenna9953@ghenna.title: Under the bones.
ghenna9953@ghenna.description:
You are under a pile of loosely stacked bones.  The night sky shows 
through the vacant eye socket of a human skull above you.  With a 
minimal amount of effort, you could free yourself.

ghenna9976@ghenna.title: The end of the hallway.
ghenna9976@ghenna.description:
You have reached the end of the hallway.  A door towards the South 
stands ajar, while the hallway continues Eastward, back where you 
came.

ghenna9968@ghenna.title: A north-south street in Ghenna.
ghenna9968@ghenna.description:
This narrow lane runs North to South.  The city wall towers above 
you to the east, and a door lies West, beneath a glowing red light.

ghenna9927@ghenna.title: A labyrinth of bodies.
ghenna9927@ghenna.description:
You are standing within a labyrinth created from bodies which are 
stacked 10 feet high.  It seems that some of the bodies are still warm,
and an occasional moan of despair comes from the mass.

ghenna9937@ghenna.title: A lair full of corpses.
ghenna9937@ghenna.description:
This ledge is slippery with the blood of hundreds of vanquished 
adventurers who made the mistake of entering here.  Corpses, corpses, 
everywhere.  At least you finally found the source of that horrific 
sulfur smell.  A black, steaming substance is smeared all over the 
walls emitting the funk.  As if this werent bad enough, you suddenly 
have the feeling that your life is about to end soon. 
---> HASTA LA VISTA!

ghenna9940@ghenna.title: A crawlspace.
ghenna9940@ghenna.description:
You are in a crawlspace that is just barely passable.  There is a 
bend to the right, but you cannot possibly tell where it leads.  It 
is so tight here that there is no way you can return south.

ghenna9956@ghenna.title: A burned out building.
ghenna9956@ghenna.description:
Charred rubble fills this room, and a fallen beam lays accross a 
skeleton that is bleached white with age.  To the West you can see 
the cobblestone streets of Ghenna.  You might want to exit this 
building soon, as it could crumble at any moment.

ghenna9980@ghenna.title: A slimey footpath.
ghenna9980@ghenna.description:
The slime just keeps getting thicker as you walk along.  There are 
many dead animals that apparently became bogged down here.  There are 
exits to the North, and East.

ghenna9995@ghenna.title: A quivering jaunt.
ghenna9995@ghenna.description:
You have entered a quivering jaunt.  It feels like you are in the
belly of a giant beast.  The mucuslike walls are a deep red color 
that thrums with energy.  The only exit is North.

ghenna9954@ghenna.title: The streets of Ghenna.
ghenna9954@ghenna.description:
You are standing on of the many streets in Ghenna.  A high wall 
blocks the passage westward, but you may exit North, South or East.

ghenna9998@ghenna.title: A dead end.
ghenna9998@ghenna.description:
The street dead ends here in a twisted mass of &+Ybrambles&*.  A high 
city wall looms over you to the West.  It seems the only exit is 
North.

ghenna9921@ghenna.title: An upstairs hallway.
ghenna9921@ghenna.description:
You are standing in an upstairs hallway in Blood Tavern.  A door 
lies South, while to the East is the top of the stairs.

ghenna9925@ghenna.title: A labyrinth of bodies.
ghenna9925@ghenna.description:
You are standing within a labyrinth created from bodies which are 
stacked 10 feet high.  It seems that some of the bodies are still 
warm, and an occasional cry of despair comes from the mass.

ghenna9972@ghenna.title: The bottom of the stairs.
ghenna9972@ghenna.description:
A staircase is here, a crusty pair of panties stuck to the 
bannister.  Nasty!  To the East is the waiting room.

ghenna9930@ghenna.title: A labyrinth of bodies.
ghenna9930@ghenna.description:
You are standing within a labyrinth created from bodies which are 
stacked 10 feet high.  It seems that some of the bodies are still warm,
and an occasional gurgling cry of despair comes from the mass.

ghenna9936@ghenna.title: Lair entrance.
ghenna9936@ghenna.description:
This is an arched cavern of great size - it looks like the Houston 
Astrodome.  a great ledge of rock juts out above your head, showering 
you with a steady gush of blood and entrails.  A raucous sound of 
crunching viscera, intermingled with a slurp here and there, turns 
your stomach.  Then you hear it... an encouraging voice which keeps 
repeating "Yes, yes, thats it... just a few steps more...You're almost 
there."

ghenna9938@ghenna.title: A cramped grotto.
ghenna9938@ghenna.description:
You are in a cramped grotto over the cave entrance.  Even if you 
aren't claustrophobic this place can surely make you that way.  A 
crawlspace leads West.  Watch your head.

ghenna9993@ghenna.title: Crawlspace.
ghenna9993@ghenna.description:
You crawl into the hole, which is infested with bugs that crunch 
under your weight - GROSS!  You can continue Southward this way, if 
the bugs dont bother you too much, or you can back out into the 
tunnel to the North.

ghenna9991@ghenna.title: An east-west tunnel.
ghenna9991@ghenna.description:
This cramped little tunnel dead ends here at a huge &+yboulder&*.  The 
only apparent exit seems to be back the way you came.

ghenna9945@ghenna.title: The granite staircase.
ghenna9945@ghenna.description:
You are standing on a narrow granite staircase which spirals gently 
downward.  You may ascend, or descend at will.

mob9917_6@ghenna.name: mob9917_6
mob9917_6@ghenna.examine:
You see a grungy human, long since gone insane at the fall of his once
proud city.

mob9904_1@ghenna.name: mob9904_1
mob9904_1@ghenna.examine:

vaguely humanoid in appearance, he seems to contain the blood of some large
carnivore.
mob9904_1@ghenna.description: A tall &+RBugbear&* stands here, poised for action.

mob9997@ghenna.name: mob9997
mob9997@ghenna.examine:

ending in mouths of many teeth.  It also has about 40 long, retractable,
flexible eye stalks that wave at you menacingly.
mob9997@ghenna.description: The &+yDeepspawn&* is standing here, ready to kill you.
